skills.skill: Sleeve and Roller Bearing Selection Criteria

duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for the design of Torque Converter parts and subsystems, including technical planning and execution of NPI, CPI, and production maintenance projects.
Interact with customers, manufacturing, and suppliers to ensure customer requirements are met, and development timelines are achieved.
Execute maintenance/CPI related tasks, drawing/model updates, and discussions with suppliers, assembly/test, platform engineering, and product support.
Utilize weekly design reviews and collaborate with mentors and the core team for support.
Work at a desk location >90% of the time, with <5% travel to customers, dealers, suppliers, and other facilities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering (Mechanical Engineering preferred)
